thread.title: CITGO Invites Consumers to Take the 'Ultimate Road Trip' with National Sweepstakes
thread.title_full: CITGO Invites Consumers to Take the 'Ultimate Road Trip' with National Sweepstakes - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CITGO Invites Consumers to Take the 'Ultimate Road Trip' with National Sweepstakes
text:
CITGO Petroleum Corporation
HOUSTON , Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Road trips are some of the greatest adventures in life, from the places you go to the people you encounter along the way. And CITGO Petroleum Corporation is making it possible for consumers to have the ultimate road trip experience through its "Ultimate Road Trip Sweepstakes," running now through Oct. 26, 2015 . Consumers simply visit www.citgosweepstakes.com to play the game and enter for the chance to win one of the hundreds of exciting road trip prizes available.
The Grand Prize winner will arrive in style with a 2015 Jeep® Wrangler Sport Unlimited and $5,000 . Three first place winners can choose their own ultimate road trip experience from the following: a South Carolina Golf Package, Grand Canyon/Sedona/Lake Powell Escorted Tour, Smoky Mountains Adventure, Maine Fishing Trip, Vermont Ski Trip, Nashville Grand Ole Opry Tour, or St. Pete Clearwater Beach Getaway. And an additional 500 second place winners will receive a National Parks Foundation membership and a $50 Bass Pro Shops® gift card.
"We're proud to be a part of our customers' lives and fuel their road trips, whether that involves everyday trips like driving to work or once-in-a-lifetime adventures like taking their dream vacation," said Alan Flagg , CITGO Assistant Vice President of Supply and Marketing. "Through our network of locally-owned stations across 29 states and Washington, D.C. , our goal is to help people get to where they want to go. The Ultimate Road Trip Sweepstakes lets us reward consumers and engage them online, in-store and through their mobile devices."
Earn additional chances to win by sharing on Facebook and Twitter and uploading store receipts from participating CITGO locations. Be sure to follow CITGO at facebook.com/CITGOFuelingGood and @Fueling_Good for more information and updates.
About CITGO
CITGO, based in Houston , is a refiner, transporter and marketer of transportation fuels, lubricants, petrochemicals and other industrial products. The company is owned by CITGO Holding, Inc., an indirect wholly owned subsidiary of Petroleos de Venezuela , S.A., the national oil company of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela . For more information, visit www.CITGO.com .
NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. A PURCHASE WILL NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING. LEGAL RESIDENTS OF AL, AR, CT, DE, FL, GA, IL, IN, KY, LA, MA, ME, MD, MI, MS, NC, NH, NY, PA, RI, SC, TN, TX, VT, WI, WV and Washington D.C. , 21+. VOID WHERE PROHIBITED. Sweepstakes ends 10/26/15. For Official Rules, alternate method of entry, prize descriptions and odds disclosure, visit www.citgosweepstakes.com . Sponsor: CITGO Petroleum Corporation, 1293 Eldridge Parkway, Houston , TX 77077. Message and data rates may apply. You will receive 1 text message in response from an automated system. Consent is not required to buy goods and services. Jeep® is a registered trademark of FCA US LLC. FCA US LLC is not a sponsor of the sweepstakes promotion.
